alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 12 at 3:48AM MDT until April 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills and the Fall River County Plains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 2 PM MDT /3 PM CDT/ this afternoon to midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
